mapper.insert: insert into tb_board(board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_content) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent})
mapper.update: update tb_board set board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_writer = #{boardWriter}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_update = sysdate where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select * from tb_board order by board_no desc

select board_no,board_title,board_writer,board_content from (select rownum as myrownum, board_no,board_title,board_writer,board_content from tb_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{pageSize}) where myrownum > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{pageSize} order by board_no desc
